[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@vue-storefront/magento-api](./magento-api.md) &gt; [CategoryFilterInput](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.md)

## CategoryFilterInput interface

CategoryFilterInput defines the filters to be used in the search. A filter contains at least one attribute, a comparison operator, and the value that is being searched for.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CategoryFilterInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [category\_uid?](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.category_uid.md) | Maybe&lt;[FilterEqualTypeInput](./magento-api.filterequaltypeinput.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filter by the unique category ID for a <code>CategoryInterface</code> object. |
|  [ids?](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.ids.md) | Maybe&lt;[FilterEqualTypeInput](./magento-api.filterequaltypeinput.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Deprecated: use 'category\_uid' to filter uniquely identifiers of categories. |
|  [name?](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.name.md) | Maybe&lt;[FilterMatchTypeInput](./magento-api.filtermatchtypeinput.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filter by the display name of the category. |
|  [parent\_category\_uid?](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.parent_category_uid.md) | Maybe&lt;[FilterEqualTypeInput](./magento-api.filterequaltypeinput.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filter by the unique parent category ID for a <code>CategoryInterface</code> object. |
|  [parent\_id?](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.parent_id.md) | Maybe&lt;[FilterEqualTypeInput](./magento-api.filterequaltypeinput.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filter by the unique parent category ID for a <code>CategoryInterface</code> object. |
|  [url\_key?](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.url_key.md) | Maybe&lt;[FilterEqualTypeInput](./magento-api.filterequaltypeinput.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filter by the part of the URL that identifies the category. |
|  [url\_path?](./magento-api.categoryfilterinput.url_path.md) | Maybe&lt;[FilterEqualTypeInput](./magento-api.filterequaltypeinput.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Filter by the URL path for the category. |
